dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Microsoft
dmca.body:
From: [e-mail address] 
To: [e-mail addresses] 
Date: Mon, 7 Aug 2006 16:35:29 +0100 
Local: Mon, Aug 7 2006 8:35 am 
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 47476 
Attachments:
 PGPexch.htm.pgp   

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

URL: http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/microsoft-office-products-2007.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/microsoft-office-products-2007.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/windows-xp-sp2b-8in1-july-25-2006dvd.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/windows-xp-sp2b-8in1-july-25-2006dvd.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/hirens-bootcd-76.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/hirens-bootcd-76.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/windows-xp-sp2-9in1.html#links, http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/06/windows-xp-live-edition-2.html#links, http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/06/mcse-self-paced-training-kit-exam-70.html#links

CASE #: 47476 

07 August 2006 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted works published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works: 

Copyrighted work(s): 
Office 12 Beta 
Windows XP Professional 
Exam 70-293: Planning and Maintaining a Microsoft Windows Server 2003 Network Infrastructure 

Copyright owner: 
Microsoft Corporation 

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following location(s): http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/microsoft-office-products-2007.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/microsoft-office-products-2007.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/windows-xp-sp2b-8in1-july-25-2006dvd.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/07/windows-xp-sp2b-8in1-july-25-2006dvd.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/hirens-bootcd-76.html#links < http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/hirens-bootcd-76.html#links> , http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2005/12/windows-xp-sp2-9in1.html#links, http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/06/windows-xp-live-edition-2.html#links, http://vtp3.blogspot.com/2006/06/mcse-self-paced-training-kit-exam-70.html#links

The above computer program(s) is being made available for copying, through downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright owner.

3. Statement of authority: 

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft, the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this software via your company's network. 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

[Name]
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation 
[Address]
Redmond, WA 98052 
United States of America 

E-mail: [e-mail address]
